page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ZOE
page.content: In the morning I get up go downstairs and have my breakfast, which is usually cornflakes and milk. After my breakfast I go upstairs and get dressed. If I have to go to school I wear my school uniform which for girls is a grey skirt, white blouse, maroon jumper and a maroon tie. After I am dressed I go upstairs and have a wash and then I go to school.At playtime I play with my friends. In class my best subject is English and maths is my least favourite.At half past three I come home from school. When I get home I go upstairs and get changed. I then go downstairs and have my tea, which is usually chips or salad.After tea I go to play on the playing field or watch some television. Then I go to bed.
